TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit XamlReader extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable
Public MustInherit Class XamlReader Implements IDisposable
public ref class XamlReader abstract : IDisposable

summary.span: 为使用 XAML 输入并生成 XAML 节点流的类提供基定义。

span.span: Provides base definitions for classes that consume XAML input and produce XAML node streams.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一个抽象类, 不提供具有所有成员的工作结果的实现或定义。 is an abstract class and does not provide implementations or definitions that have a working result for all members. 在中具有实现的成员在该成员的备注中进行了说明。Members that do have an implementation in are noted in the remarks for that member. 具体而言 , 具有多个必须实现的抽象成员和多个虚拟成员。Specifically, has several abstract members that must be implemented, and several virtual members. 在虚拟成员中, 每个都提供适用于大多数情况的默认实现。Of the virtual members, and each provide a default implementation that is appropriate for most cases. 但是, 和默认实现依赖于实现 XAML 读取器的其他预期行为; 尤其是 , 它们依赖于重写。However, the and default implementations rely on other expected behavior of the implementing XAML reader; in particular, they rely on the override. 也是具有工作默认实现的虚拟成员。 is also a virtual member that has a working default implementation. 以下两个类是 .NET Framework XAML 服务和 system.exception 程序集中最相关和实用的派生类:The following two classes are the most relevant and practical derived classes in .NET Framework XAML Services and the System.Xaml assembly: - , 它在运行时读取对象图, 如应用程序的活动对象图。, which reads an object graph, such as the active object graph of an application at run time. - , 它通过使用将文件作为中间帮助器类加载的常规来读取 XML 文本文件形式的 XAML。, which reads XAML in the form of a XML text file by using a general that loads the file as an intermediary helper class. 其他框架中的其他 XAML 读取器包括和。Other XAML readers from other frameworks include and . 与和设计原则不同, 因为没有返回基础`Create`默认 XAML 读取器实现的方法。 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xmldom](~/includes/tlasharptla-xmldom-md.md)] differs from [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xmldom](~/includes/tlasharptla-xmldom-md.md)] and design principles because does not have a `Create` method to return underlying default XAML reader implementations. 您必须通过调用其构造函数或其他特定于类的帮助程序 Api 来实例化特定的派生 XAML 读取器类。You must instead instantiate specific derived XAML reader classes by calling their constructors or other class-specific helper APIs. ## 子树读取器Subtree Readers 大多数情况下, 在派生自 的特定 XAML 读取器类的上下文中调用 API。For the most part, you call API in the context of specific XAML reader classes that derive from . 但是, 在某个特定情况下, 你可以访问非公共的实际 XAML 读取器实例上的 API, 而不是派生自或。However, in one particular case, you access API on a practical XAML reader instance that is not public and not derived from or . 在这种情况下, 调用将返回实例。This case is when you call , which returns a instance. 在默认实现中, 此 API 返回的是内部类。In the default implementation, the that is returned by this API is an internal class. 为实现的子树读取操作具有对和等 api 的有效操作, 这些操作基于父读取器类。 The obtained for subtree reading has valid actions for APIs such as and , and those actions are based on the parent reader class. 此设计允许内部类跟踪子树的输入位置的框架级别。This design enables the internal class to track the frame level where the subtree was entered. 操作子树确保当当前节点位置超出子树的边界时, 特定子树读取器将报告文件尾或`null`当前节点。The acting subtree makes sure that if the current node position is moved beyond the bounds of the subtree, the specific subtree reader reports end-of-file or `null` at the current node. 某些 api 上包含有关子树读取器使用情况的说明。Notes about subtree reader usage are included on certain APIs.

related.span: 了解 XAML 节点流结构和概念

span.span: Understanding XAML Node Stream Structures and Concepts

remarks.format: ## Remarks 子树读取器可以调用, 其行为可正确反映输入的子树的界限。Subtree readers can call , with behavior that correctly reflects the bounds of the entered subtree. 有关详细信息, 请参阅中的 "子树读取器" 部分, 或参阅。 For more information, see the "Subtree Readers" section in , or see .

value.span: 当前成员；如果读取器位置不在成员上，则为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 子树读取器可以调用, 并具有行为限制。Subtree readers can call , with behavior restrictions. 有关详细信息, 请参阅中的 "子树读取器" 部分, 或参阅。 For more information, see the "Subtree Readers" section in , or see .

summary.span: 在派生类中实现时，从当前节点中获取 XAML 命名空间信息。

span.span: When implemented in a derived class, gets the XAML namespace information from the current node.

value.span: 如果可用，则为当前节点中的 XAML 命名空间信息；否则为 。

span.span: The XAML namespace information, if it is available; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此 API 的设计目的是仅当当前节点的为时返回非 null 结果。The intended design of this API is to return a non-null result only if the of the current node is . 属性不会报告应用于一般范围内的对象或成员的 XAML 命名空间, 如 XAML 架构上下文中所述。The property does not report the XAML namespace that applies to objects or members in a general scoping sense, as interpreted under a XAML schema context. 如果你所需的信息的方式不同于 XAML 架构上下文向编写器报告的方式, 你的应用程序必须提供一种方法来缓存正在进行的 XAML 命名空间的信息。Your application must provide a means to cache information for the acting XAML namespace as it traverses XAML nodes, if you need that information in a manner other than how the XAML schema context reports it to a writer. 有关参考实现的说明, 请参阅。See for notes on the reference implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Xaml.XamlReader ReadSubtree() cil managed
Public Overridable Function ReadSubtree () As XamlReader
abstract member ReadSubtree : unit -> System.Xaml.XamlReader override this.ReadSubtree : unit -> System.Xaml.XamlReader

summary.span: 返回基于当前 的 ，其中返回的 用于循环访问 XAML 节点结构。

span.span: Returns a that is based on the current , where the returned is used to iterate through a subtree of the XAML node structure.

returns.span: 子树的新 XAML 读取器实例。

span.span: A new XAML reader instance for the subtree.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法具有默认实现并返回有效的。This method has a default implementation and returns a valid . 返回的是一个限制特定操作的内部类。The returned is an internal class that restricts certain actions. 这些限制与仅读取 XAML 节点集的较大源的已划分维度的子树有关, 以及在退出子树时返回文件尾或`null`当前节点上的。The restrictions are consistent with the purpose of reading only a dimensioned subtree of a larger source for a XAML node set, and of returning end-of-file or `null` at the current node when the subtree is exited. 通常, 应从初始节点检查当前节点, 以确定是否需要子树读取器。Generally, you should check the current node from the initial to determine whether you need a subtree reader. 检查此项的方式可能是特定于实现的;但是, 应避免为每个子树创建多个子树读取器。How you check this may be implementation-specific; however, avoid creating multiple subtree readers for every subtree. 此外, 避免为不能包含节点子树的某些节点事例 (例如, ) 调用子树读取器。In addition, avoid invoking a subtree reader for certain node cases (for example, for ) that cannot contain a subtree of nodes. 获取子树读取器后, 必须调用它以获取当前节点 (或调用以获取下一个节点)。After you obtain a subtree reader, you must call on it to obtain a current node (or call to obtain a next node). 创建子树后, 不会自动从子树读取器获取初始节点位置。You do not automatically obtain an initial node position from the subtree reader when you create it. 通过从该默认实现调用获取的读取器是一个内部类。The reader you obtain by calling from this default implementation is an internal class. 内部类在调用时 将其行为基于正在使用的实现。The internal class bases its behavior on the implementation that is being used when is called. 内部类的用途是将和常规遍历行为进行包装。The purpose of the internal class is to wrap the and general traversal behavior. 遍历通过跟踪/对或对来保持在所需的子树中。 / The traversal stays within the intended subtree by keeping track of / pairs or / pairs. 当读取器位于`false`子树`true`末尾时 (由其入口点定义), 它还为和正确返回。 It also correctly returns `false` for and `true` for when the reader is at the end of the subtree, as defined by its entry point. 通常, 假设从子树读取器调用的任何 API 都具有与整体相同的实现 (遍历边界行为除外)。In general, you assume that any API you call from a subtree reader has the same implementation as the overall except for the traversal bounding behavior. 不过, 是虚拟的。However, is virtual. 因此, 特定实现可提供与内部包装行为不同的行为; 实现甚至可以通过返回或其他来禁用子树读取器功能。不同.Therefore, a specific implementation can provide behavior that differs from the internal wrapper behavior; and a implementation can even disable subtree reader functionality by returning or other exceptions.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Skip() cil managed
abstract member Skip : unit -> unit override this.Skip : unit -> unit

summary.span: 跳过当前节点并将读取器位置推进到下一个节点。

span.span: Skips the current node and advances the reader position to the next node.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 跳过后 , 默认实现将调用。Once skipped, is called by the default implementation. 通常不按顺序调用和 。You typically do not call and in sequence. 在默认实现中, 将采用不同的操作, 具体取决于读取器位置当前所在的位置。In the default implementation, different actions are taken depending on which the reader position is currently on. 如果读取器位置当前在或上, 则将跳过该成员或对象。If the reader position is currently on a or , that member or object is skipped. 对于其他值, 不会执行任何操作, 而不是从当前位置调用。For other values, no action is taken other than calling from the current position. 子树读取器可以调用, 并具有行为限制。Subtree readers can call , with behavior restrictions. 有关详细信息, 请参阅中的 "子树读取器" 部分, 或参阅。 For more information, see the "Subtree Readers" section in , or see . 的节点树行为基于等效的 XML。The node tree behavior of is based on the XML equivalent . 基于行为等效项, 跳过节点及其子树, 而不仅仅是单个进入节点。 Based on the behavior equivalence, skips the node and its subtree, not just the single entry node.

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance void System.IDisposable.Dispose() cil managed

summary.span: 释放 类的当前实例所使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the class.
